explains: v. 解剖（人或动物的尸体）；剖析，详细评论（某事物）；把（田地）分成小块

sentences.en: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
sentences.cn: 人们想剖析他的作品，质疑他的动机。

sentences.en: He watched her peel and dissect a pear neatly, no mess, no sticky fingers.
sentences.cn: 他看着她利索地削了个梨并切成几块，整整齐齐，手指干干净净。

sentences.en: In biology class we had to dissect a frog.
sentences.cn: 上生物课时我们得解剖青蛙。
